title: Bit End
description: Bit end, two Beasts gripping rim of circle; harness ring of circular shape, decorated with lions in profile relief on  either side and probably an ibex head (now lost) at top;   incised lines indicate paws and mane of lions, but otherwise undecorated; at top, on back, is a loop for attaching ring to a strap; head of right beast broken off at neck, but extant
